Data Example 14: Default values for missing attributes

Attributes 'job' are added by SWAC to every dataset where its missing.


var data_example14_options = {
  attributeDefaults: new Map([['../../data/exampledata_list.json',{job: 'programmer'}]])
};
            

<div id="data_example14" swa="Edit FROM ../../data/exampledata_list.json"></div>
